english_text: Hello! How can I help you today?
yoruba_text: Báwo ni mo ṣe lè ràn ẹ lọwọ lónìí?
pidgin_text: How you dey? Wetin you need today?

yoruba_text: O dàbọ̀!
Balance rẹ ni ₦5,000.

english_text: You don’t have enough funds to complete this transaction.
yoruba_text: Owo to wa ninu akanti yin ko to lati pari ìdúnà.
pidgin_text: You no get enough money for this transaction.

english_text: Transfer failed. Kindy try again later.
yoruba_text: Ifiranṣẹ ko ṣeyọrí. Gbiyanju lẹ́ẹ̀kan si.
pidgin_text: Transfer no go. Try again later.

english_text: It’s time to contribute to your Ajo.
yoruba_text: Àkókò àjọ rẹ́ ti dé o.
pidgin_text: Time don reach to drop your Ajo money.

english_text: Remember to save towards your goal.
yoruba_text: Ranti lati fipamọ́ fún àfojúsùn rẹ.
pidgin_text: No forget to save small for your goal.

yoruba_text: Ifiranṣẹ ṣeyọrí!
O ti darapọ̀ mọ ẹgbẹ́ Ajo.
pidgin_text: You don join the Ajo group.

english_text: Don’t share your PIN with anyone.
yoruba_text: Má fi PIN rẹ́ fún ẹnikẹ́ni.

english_text: Always save at least 10% of your income.
yoruba_text: Maṣe gbagbe lati fipamọ́ 10% ti owo oṣooṣu rẹ.
pidgin_text: Try save at least 10% of your money.

english_text: Always double-check account numbers before sending money.
yoruba_text: Máṣe gbagbe láti ṣàyẹ̀wò nomba àkọọlẹ̀ kí o tó fi owó ranṣẹ.
pidgin_text: Always check account number well before you send money.

yoruba_text: jọ̀wọ́ dúró díẹ̀.
pidgin_text: Hold on small, e dey load.

yoruba_text: Nkankan ṣẹlẹ̀.
Àfojúsùn fipamọ́ ṣẹda ni aṣeyọrí.
pidgin_text: You don set your savings goal sharp sharp.

yoruba_text: Báwo ni mo ṣe lè ràn ẹ lọwọ?
Ó dàbọ̀! Ọjọ́ ayọ̀ ni fún ọ.
pidgin_text: Bye-bye! Your day go go well.

english_text: Do you want to confirm this payment?
yoruba_text: Ṣe o fẹ́ fọwọ́si ìsanwó yìí?
Tẹ PIN mẹ́rin rẹ.
PIN rẹ̀ kò tọ́.
Rira airtime ṣeyọrí!
Ẹ káàbọ̀ padà!
Rira airtime ko ṣeyọrí.

english_text: Thank you for using our service!
yoruba_text: O ṣeun fún lílo iṣẹ́ wa!
Balance àfojúsùn rẹ ni ₦10,000.
